title.narrative: The government and other key stakeholders have an improved capacity to legislate, coordinate, plan and monitor WASH services

description.narrative: Due to COVID19 context with restrictions measures adopted by Government, UNICEF support to Government during the reporting period was limited to the improvement of the national WASH data management system and sector coordination in both emergency and development contexts | Status:On-track | As-of Date:30/06/2020

title.narrative: WASH sector plans integrating climate resilient development and/or risk management strategies available
Sector reviews or similar mechanisms regularly assess progress against targets and set priority actions
Properly functioning sector-coordinating body (development and humanitarian)

actual.value: 2020:5 sector groups and 2 clusters are functioning
2020:Public Expenditures Review for WASH sector completed and is being used for advoicacy.

title.narrative: Government-led national monitoring system in place

actual.value: 2020:Updated and constrained by the total change of the entire technical team in charge of running the system.
